languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}
The wearer of this helmet gains +{uip|Armour|71687ec9ba584ffa95cd1e81a54bcd92}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The helmet also grants a bonus to Fellowship equal to {uip|Fellowship|71687ec9ba584ffa95cd1e81a54bcd92}.
languages.original_text:
Требуется: Убеждение — Благодеяние
Владелец этого шлема получает +<u>2×(бонус Воли)</u> к Защите. Шлем также дает бонус к Воле, равный <u>2×(ранг Благодеяния)</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Conviction — Benevolentia
The wearer of this helmet gains +<u>2 × Fellowship bonus</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g}. The helmet also grants bonus to Fellowship equal to <u>2 × (Benevolentia rank)</u>.

Requires Conviction — Benevolentia
The wearer of this helmet gains +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g}. The helmet also grants a bonus to FEL equal to <u>(2 × Benevolentia rank)</u>.

languages.text:

languages.text:

languages.text:
